record.id: field.name="cause.code" and file.name="incidents" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: cause.code
record.file.name: incidents

brief.brief: The probable cause of the issue that generated the need for this Interaction.

detail.detail: Cause codes enable you to categorize and assign, simplifying reporting and tracking.
This field links this Interaction to a probable cause record.

When you add a cause code to an Incident Interaction using the Fill function, you can also add accompanying information, such as Category and Description, to the Interaction from the corresponding probable cause record.
